rows.label: bf02120160_0010
rows.name:
Don't do it, Nii-chan, 
it's too dangerous!

rows.label: bf02120160_0020
rows.name:
What will we do if something happens to you?
Who'll look after us?

rows.label: bf02120160_0030
rows.name: N-Nii-chan...

rows.label: bf02120160_0040
rows.name: I-I know it's dangerous.

rows.label: bf02120160_0050
rows.name: But if I can b-become a Driver...

rows.label: bf02120160_0060
rows.name: Outta the way, pipsqueak!

rows.label: bf02120160_0070
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Oof!

rows.label: bf02120160_0080
rows.name:
All right, come on Blade boyo! Show
me whatcha got! Hrooagh!

rows.label: bf02120160_0090
rows.name: A-a-a-aaaah!

rows.label: bf02120160_0100
rows.name: Yeah, he's done for.

rows.label: bf02120160_0110
rows.name: Indeed.

rows.label: bf02120160_0120
rows.name: Waaaah!

rows.label: bf02120160_0130
rows.name:
Oho, all bark and no bite!
What a shame!

rows.label: bf02120160_0140
rows.name:
Eurgh, what just happened?
All that blood...

rows.label: bf02120160_0150
rows.name: Couldn't handle the Core Crystal's power.

rows.label: bf02120160_0160
rows.name:
That's what happens when someone
unqualified touches a Core Crystal.

rows.label: bf02120160_0170
rows.name: Truly lamentable.

rows.label: bf02120160_0180
rows.name:
Wait, you need a qualification to be
a Driver?

rows.label: bf02120160_0190
rows.name:
Perhaps "aptitude" would be a better
word.

rows.label: bf02120160_0200
rows.name: Aptitude?

rows.label: bf02120160_0210
rows.name: Now, is there nobody else here...

rows.label: bf02120160_0220
rows.name:
ready to test their strength
for the glory of the Empire?!

rows.label: bf02120160_0230
rows.name:
Oh! How about you? What say you?
Step forwards, sir, with bold heart!

rows.label: bf02120160_0240
rows.name: Nii-chan!

rows.label: bf02120160_0250
rows.name: Don't... Don't worry.

rows.label: bf02120160_0260
rows.name:
Your older brother's gonna be a Driver,
and then we'll be set for life.

rows.label: bf02120160_0270
rows.name: Nii-chan!

rows.label: bf02120160_0280
rows.name: Ah-aah-ah-aaaaaah!

rows.label: bf02120160_0290
rows.name: Congratulations... I guess?

rows.label: bf02120160_0300
rows.name: Nii-chan!

rows.label: bf02120160_0310
rows.name: You did it, Nii-chan!

rows.label: bf02120160_0320
rows.name: Nii-chaan!

rows.label: bf02120160_0330
rows.name: I...I did it!

rows.label: bf02120160_0340
rows.name:
The Core Crystal turned into...
a weapon?

rows.label: bf02120160_0350
rows.name: That is how Blades are born, Rex.

rows.label: bf02120160_0360
rows.name: What? But when I touched Homura's...

rows.label: bf02120160_0370
rows.name:
She's a special case.
Homura is the Heavenly Holy Grail, remember?

rows.label: bf02120160_0380
rows.name: So the usual rules don't apply.

rows.label: bf02120160_0390
rows.name:
All that business with sharing her
life force... It's not exactly normal.

rows.label: bf02120160_0400
rows.name: That's cool but what does Holy Grail even mean?

rows.label: bf02120160_0410
rows.name: Shin and Metsu... They called her that, too.

rows.label: bf02120160_0420
rows.name:
Dunno. All I know is that it's
some kinda legendary Blade.

rows.label: bf02120160_0430
rows.name: Why don't you just ask her yourself?

rows.label: bf02120160_0440
rows.name:
Let's go. No point sticking around for the
enrollment ceremony and all that boring stuff.
